description:
Tree Works Application in Whitehall Park, Conservation Area, 2A Lysander Grove, Islington London N19 3QY

A tree application has been received to do tree work at 2A Lysander Grove, rear garden.

-	Horse Chestnut; reduce back overhanging branches towards the property leaving a gap of 3.5 metres. Remove epicormic growth up to crown break, crown thin by 10% to 15% but, no more than 15% Removal of deadwood in crown and rubbing and crossing branches. 

-	Lime Tree; Removal of deadwood in the grown, crown thin by 10% to 15% but, no more than 15%, removal of epicormic growth. Crown lift over the Public highway to 2.5 metres. 

-	Sycamore; Crown thin by no more than 10%, removal of deadwood in the crown, also removal of Ivy, by cutting the Ivy around the base of the stem. Removal of epicormic growth/branches from the stem up to crown break.
decision_conditions:
Sycamore; please, ask the tree contractor to inspect the fork for included bark. 
The Lime appears to have more deadwood than usual, please ask tree contractor to check for problems in the crown.
